name: html-figma
description: Convert DOM node to Figma Node

scripts.publish:package: npm run build:package && cd build && npm publish
scripts.build:package: tsc --project tsconfig.json && cpx README.md build/ && cpx package.json build/
scripts.build:tests: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('.parcel-cache',{recursive:true})" && cross-env PARCEL_WORKERS=1 parcel build tests/page/index.ts --no-optimize --dist-dir dist --cache-dir .parcel-cache && cpx "tests/page/stubs/**/*" dist/stubs
scripts.test: cross-env NO_UPDATE_NOTIFIER=1 npm run build:tests && jest tests --runInBand

author: Sergei Savelev
